title: New: Sleepyface – Cement Shoes
content:
If you hadn’t already twigged, I love a bit of downbeat, from-the-bedroom sounding lo-fi.

This new track from New Jersey’s Sleepyface is entirely that, rough round the edges but all the more elegant for it. Combining the raw intimacy of Casiotone For The Painfully alone, with a twinge of autotune, Cement Shoes demands repeated listens. Despite it’s minimal approach, there’s far more to the track than is initially revealed, with it bordering the line between being A-list indie playlist and a sumptuous out and out pop anthem. Check out Cement Shoes below.

Cement Shoes by Sleepyface
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
